name: TetrisRush (Charles Peachy, Hefan)
description:
For a better experience, play with fullscreen, or download and play the windows version :-) Description:

This is a game made for the game jam, SpaceScore#19.

Rules:

Use tetrominoes to clear out the obstacles lying on the road!

Control:
  • Arrow Key: Move/Rotate Tetrimino
  • Space: Hard Drop a Tetrimino
Attributes:
  • Audio: Sound from Zapsplat.com, by Zapsplat & Audio Hero
  • Model & Animation: 
    • Character Pack - Lowpoly FREE
    • Lowpoly_Cat_Rig_+_Run_Animation by Daily Lowpoly
    • Stylized_Low_Poly_German_Shepherd by DreamNoms
    • Basic Motions FREE
    • POLYGON Town Pack - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty
